title: Hindu Marriage Disabilities Removal Act, 1946
description: Official consolidated text of Hindu Marriage Disabilities Removal Act, 1946 (XXVIII of 1946) published by The Pakistan Code (Family Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and extent
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Hindu Marriage Disabilities
Removal Act, 1946.
2
[(2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan.]

provisions.title: Section 2. Marriages between persons of same gotra or pravara or of different sub
provisions.content:
divisions of
the same caste. Notwithstanding any text, rule or interpretation of the Hindu Law or any custom or
usage, a marriage between Hindus, which is otherwise valid, shall not be invalid by reason only of
(a)         belong to the same gotra or pravara, or
(b)         belong to different sub-divisions of the same caste.
